channel.title: PostHog on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in PostHog on Site Bay Guides & Tutorials

item.title: Leveraging Feature Flags for A/B Testing on Site Bay
item.description: Feature flags, also known as feature toggles, are a powerful technique for controlling the roll-out of features on your website.

item.title: Integrating Posthog Surveys on Your WordPress Site
item.description: Want to get real feedback directly from your users? Adding Posthog surveys to your WordPress site hosted on Site Bay can give you valuable insights into what your audience thinks and wants.

item.title: Events with Posthog on Site Bay
item.description: If you haven’t already, set up your Site Bay WordPress hosting environment. Check out our guides on Getting Started with Site Bay and Deploying Your First WordPress Site.

item.title: Understanding "People" in PostHog Analytics
item.description: What is “People” in PostHog?In PostHog, the “People” feature refers to the users who interact with your product or website.

item.title: Mastering Data Management with PostHog on Site Bay
item.description: Mastering Data Management with PostHog on Site Bay Welcome to the guide on leveraging PostHog for optimal data management on Site Bay.

item.title: PostHog Insights
item.description: PostHog insights are the core components of dashboards OverviewInsights in PostHog display your data through various information visualization components.
